name: sammler-io-audit-logs
description: Node.js library to send audit-logs to the s5r/auth-service.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:src && npm run lint:test
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:src:fix && npm run lint:test:fix
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run coverage
scripts.test:integration:watch: export JWT_SECRET='My Secret' && npm run test:unit && nyc --reporter=lcov mocha './test/integration/**/*.spec.js' --require './test/mocha.conf.js' --reporter=min --timeout 6000 --watch
